title: Understanding Climate Change
subtitle: Why our planet is warming and what we can do today
section_1:
1. The Science
Rising greenhouse gas levels trap more heat in the atmosphere, accelerating global warming.
section_2:
2. Everyday Impact
Expect more intense storms, shifting seasons, and stress on food and water supplies.
section_3:
3. Take Action
Cut energy waste, support clean energy, and advocate for climate-smart policies.
callToAction: Learn more, share what you discover, and be part of the climate solution.
